import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) /* export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { email = "" password = "" errorMessage = "Datos Incorrectos" failedLogin = false constructor(private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { } handleLogin() : void { if(this.email === "mine@gmail.com" && this.password === "test123") { // Redirect to Welcome Page this.router.navigate(['eventos', this.email]) this.failedLogin = false } else { this.failedLogin = true } console.log(this.failedLogin) } }*/ export class LoginComponent { email = "" password = "" errorMessage = "Datos Incorrectos" failedLogin = false constructor(private router: Router) {} handleLogin() : void { if(this.email === "mine@gmail.com" && this.password === "test123") { // Redirect to Welcome Page this.router.navigate(['home', this.email]) this.failedLogin = false } else { this.failedLogin = true } console.log(this.failedLogin) } }
